column4: hello everyone...i want to see some errors occured in error.log file in my ubuntu server edition pc..so for that i need to copy or transfer or share it from windows pc..how should i do this
actionparsnip-no i two different pc ,for windows and ubuntu both r in different their own pc
Why is it you need to move it to the other machine exactly?
Full sentences with properly spelled out words will get you much more coherent help than pre-teen text-speak.
